title: Investigation Into Deaths at Travis Scott Concert to Examine Host of Issues
sub_head: Whether there was adequate security, cause of crowd surge and reports of drug injections will all be investigated, say authorities
body:
HOUSTON—The investigation into the events that led to eight deaths and multiple injuries Friday night at a Travis Scott concert here will examine a host of issues, including what caused a reported crowd surge, whether the show employed adequate security, and reports that someone was injecting concertgoers with drugs, according to authorities.
“This incident is being thoroughly investigated and reviewed,” said Houston Mayor Sylvester Turner Saturday afternoon. “We’re trying to get a much better understanding of what took place, what went wrong, where were the missteps.”
